document.full_text: the disneyland paris theme park closed its "thunder mountain" train ride on monday after a piece of scenery fell onto one of the carriages and injured five people, one seriously, a state official told reuters.
document.title: disneyland paris shuts ride after accident: official
lines_and_colors: the disneyland paris theme park closed its "thunder mountain" train ride on monday after a piece of scenery fell onto one of the carriages and injured five people, one seriously, a state official told reuters.
